text: Herman Philipse (born May 13, 1951 in The Hague) is a Dutch philosopher, specialized in epistemology. Philipse studied law and philosophy at Leiden University. From 1986 to 2003 he was a philosophy professor at Leiden University. Since 2003 he has been a philosophy professor at Utrecht University. Philipse is an atheist. He has published on philosophy and atheism. == References == * www.sg.uu.nl Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century philosophers Category:21st-century philosophers Category:Dutch academics Category:Dutch atheists Category:Dutch philosophers Category:Writers from The Hague
title: Herman Philipse
